review_text: This hotel almost makes me feel like I'm a king. When I address any issues, they get it fix right away. The location of this hotel is perfect. Concierge is very helpful. You can't go wrong with this hotel for sureDear Matthew S, We are humbled by your complimentary review of your recent stay at our hotel. Thank you for allowing us to provide you with superior and thoughtful service and most importantly, we thank you for making us your new favorite hotel.Sincerely,Octavia MargineanHotel Manager
